com.apporiented.hermesftp.streams

Class BlockModeInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • com.apporiented.hermesftp.streams.BlockModeInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BlockModeConstants, RecordReadSupport, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class BlockModeInputStream
extends InputStream
implements RecordReadSupport, BlockModeConstants
    Reads a stream formatted in block mode, extracts the data contents and registers restart markers.
    Author:
    Lars Behnke
